# init(boundingBox:)

**Initializer**

Creates a detected object observation with the bounding box you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
init(boundingBox: NormalizedRect)
```

## Creating an observation

- **init(_:)**: Creates a detected object observation.
title: init(boundingBox:)
